Articles.Content:
I know we will have see through windows in KSP 2 so I think it would be cool to have a glass sphere pod or glass cone that is all see through.

Edited May 24, 2022 by Ryaja

2 minutes ago, Ryaja said:

I know we will have see through windows in KSP 2 so I think it would be cool to have a glass sphere pod or glass cone that is all see through.

Yeah. I want the IVA view from KSP 1 implemented. But not having it look like the windows are just invisible entirely, i want it Opaque.

Just now, Catto said:

Yeah. I want the IVA view from KSP 1 implemented. But not having it look like the windows are just invisible entirely, i want it Opaque.

They could have little scratches here and there so you know there is glass and reflections
It's always bothered me that the cupola is the only crew compartment in KSP that has an unobstructed view of the direction of travel. More choices would be welcome.
These pods along with ScienceLabs and maybe some others should be chair-less the Kerbal in them would float or hold-on the hand-grip. Not just sit there like grinning idiots.
